document.full_text: lawyers for president barack obama on wednesday sought to stave off the biggest legal challenge yet to his landmark healthcare reform, telling a court that its key provision is grounded in congress' right to regulate commerce.
document.title: healthcare battle unfolds in atlanta court
lines_and_colors: lawyers for president barack obama on wednesday sought to stave off the biggest legal challenge yet to his landmark healthcare reform, telling a court that its key provision is grounded in congress' right to regulate commerce.
